Description of incident: Alumni who graduated before 1985 and requested copies of their transcripts may have been affected by a breach involving accidental disclosure.  Certain alumni had their names, Social Security numbers, addresses, and telephone numbers in an electronic file that was emailed to an individual who would not normally have access to such information.  The person who received the email notified the University.UPDATE (5/03/2012): This breach was erroneously listed as occurring in Corpus Christi, Texas on this site. The breach affected those who were associated with Texas A&M University in College Station, Texas.
